name: Dragon Countdown
description:
I am Teddy and welcome to Dragon Countdown! 

My super power is... My dedication. My dedication and my ambition to staying alive until I am ready to turn into Teador the Dragon!

A yeah! I can turn into a dragon, some kind of famiy stuff you know...

Some people say that my super power is accually this. Who knows?

Never mind...

So today I came to forest because I will turn into a dragon in a couple of minutes and this deep forests is the best place for this.

Some people and some dragon says that this forest is full of wierd creatures that can kill as they touches me, but... Seems like a legend...

Right?..

And no one can hurt me when I am a dragon

Right?..

Never mind...

Tap to play!
